publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-706 Kenneth Gibson: Independence Referendums in the Basque Countryâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of the Basque Government that it will hold two referendums, in 2008 and 2010, in which the Basque people will be asked to vote for independence, and believes that holding referendums will assist the cause of peace, progress and democracy in the Basque Country.
S3M-706 Independence Referendums in the Basque Country (lodged on 26 October 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*
S3M-706 Independence Referendums in the Basque Country (lodged on 26 October 2007) Bob Doris*
S3M-706 Independence Referendums in the Basque Country (lodged on 26 October 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-706 Independence Referendums in the Basque Country (lodged on 26 October 2007) Bill Wilson*
S3M-706 Independence Referendums in the Basque Country (lodged on 26 October 2007) Willie Coffey*
